title: The Guardian
overview: Post 90s police cadets Wang Ji Xiang, Luo Xin and Zhang Miao Miao have been assigned to the Yong Cheng Xin Qiao Police Station after graduation. However, Luo Xin accidentally causes the death of a mentally handicapped girl and receives a 2-year prison sentence. With the police station in a crisis, Chen Xiao Jing is set to take over as the new director. Wang Ji Xiang works hard to rectify their name while Zhang Miao Miao finds that a way to engage and help the masses through webcasting. Together with their fellow officers, they aim to bring the police station to its former glory.Â
